reviews.comment: Incredible experience at Cocoon Canggu! I had the Colontherapy, IV fusion and full body LED light treatment. My nurse was Nurse Dita,  she conducted the Colontherapy and IV treatment. She was gentle and informative, and highly experienced. Everything was sterile and they showed all medications in date. During the IV fusion, the lovely Tini did a quick face wash and Gold Colagen mask, plus an amazing foot massage - Iâ€™ve had IV treatments at other salons and this wasnâ€™t included (and for the same price). The LED light is no joke - itâ€™s massive and covers the entire body. Itâ€™s industrial strength and definitely worth the price point. Shout out to Weby at the front desk who made the booking  and after-care instructions super easy. Highly recommend.

reviewReply.comment:
Thank you so much, Palina! 
Weâ€™re thrilled to hear you had such a positive and thorough experience with us. Nurse Dita, Tini, and Webi will be so happy to read your kind words. We take pride in providing safe, high-quality treatments with thoughtful touches, so your feedback truly means a lot. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Best regards,
Cocoon Canggu Team
